channel.title: Caret on DataStruggle
channel.description: Recent content in Caret on DataStruggle

item.title: Automated Machine Learning to predict boxing match winners
item.description: Packages Used library(tidyverse) # Data prep library(h2o) # Automated machine learning library(naniar) # Identifying missing data library(funModeling) # Quick histograms for features library(Hmisc) # Statistical summaries library(caret) # Confusion matrices I came across a dataset that peaked my interest in something I enjoy watching, boxing. The data has been scrapped from a boxing bout website with a large quantity of data available. Using this data we can try to predict winners of each bout with automated machine learning.
